title: Experimental reservoir computing with diffractively coupled VCSELs
authors:
Moritz Pfl\"uger, Daniel Brunner, Tobias Heuser, James A. Lott,
  Stephan Reitzenstein, Ingo Fischer
abstract:
We present experiments on reservoir computing (RC) using a network of
vertical-cavity surface-emitting lasers (VCSELs) that we diffractively couple
via an external cavity. Our optical reservoir computer consists of 24 physical
VCSEL nodes. We evaluate the system's memory and solve the 2-bit XOR task and
the 3-bit header recognition (HR) task with bit error ratios (BERs) below 1\,\%
and the 2-bit digital-to-analog conversion (DAC) task with a root-mean-square
error (RMSE) of 0.067.
